Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Storage

Class StorageContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Storage.StorageContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public class StorageContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisposable
    Represents a logical collection of storage files.
    Author:
    Halofreak1990

      • GetDirectoryNames

        public java.lang.String[] GetDirectoryNames(java.lang.String searchPattern)
        Enumerates the directories in the root of a StorageContainer that conform to a search pattern.
        Parameters:
        searchPattern - A search pattern. Both single-character ("?") and multicharacter ("*") wildcards are supported.
